Html:
Hello,

I always get a Blue Cross at the middle of the map when i zoom or jump to a position. How do i deactivate this?

Using WPF.

Didn't find something in this forum even if I am sure I am not the first one who doesn't want this.

 

And thank you radioman for this great piece of work.
Sorry i didn't get how to remove the Blue Cross. Could you give me a more detailed explanation? I'm using Winform.
Well the blue cross is always shown. In the release build too.
Sorry I'm wrong. The release build is the solution. Thanks very much.
p.s. if you don't like the red cross, set, map.ShowCenter = false;

Hello I join this topic because I have the same problem, only I could not solve it using the Release, in the proof of control if I could do it, but in my project using the Release does not hide the blue cross.


I would like to know how I can remove that code blue cross, or else I have to add in my code so that the use Release instead of debug not display the blue cross.


Thanks in advance.
just update references, you use old references from debug build
